mapper.sql: ID, WARN_MODULE, WARN_LEVEL, WARN_MSG, WARN_TIME, STATUS, HANDLER, HANDLE_TIME
mapper.select:
select
from sys_warn_log where STATUS IN (0, 1) order by WARN_TIME desc limit 0, 10
mapper.insert: insert into sys_warn_log (ID, WARN_MODULE, WARN_LEVEL, WARN_MSG, WARN_TIME, STATUS, HANDLER, HANDLE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warnModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warnLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warnMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warnTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{handler,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

ID,

mapper.update:
update sys_warn_log
WARN_MODULE = #{warnModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WARN_LEVEL = #{warnLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WARN_MSG = #{warnMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WARN_TIME = #{warnTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HANDLER = #{handler,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HANDLE_TIME = #{handleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
